body.p:
To his Excellency B. Magoffin
Governor of Kentucky

We the undersigned citizens of Fulton County Respectfully represent that at the present Term of the Equity & Criminal Court of this county Mike Sherran was tried convicted and sentenced to the Pententiary for 3 years under an indictment for aiding and assisting in the murder of one John Sherran Harrington
We further represent to your Excellency that we beleive Mike Sherrans case presents strong reasons for the propriety of the Exorcise of your Excellency's clemency

"The unfortunate man who was killed was a northern man the associate of a free negro. And the cause of the difficulty was the refusal of Mike Sherran to drink with the negro. when the deceased become offended and told Mike Sherran and others that the negro was as good as they were
We know Mike Sherran to be a peaceable quient industrious Irishman. And we respectfully beg your Excellency to pardon him.

John Cusack
Patrick Green
Walter Cusick
Luke Dillon
Patruk Judge
